heroSlider.subtitle: Whether you want to become a frontend, backend, or full-stack developer, our roadmaps will guide you every step of the way.

coursesSection.title: Best Courses, Handpicked for You
coursesSection.description: We offer a curated collection of the most popular courses in web development, programming languages, and more. Our platform features both free and paid courses that provide comprehensive content to help you grow as a developer. Whether you’re looking to learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, or dive into frameworks like React and Node.js, we have a course for you.

technologiesSection.title: Understand the Technologies Behind Development
technologiesSection.description: Explore the essential technologies in web development. In our Technologies section, you’ll find clear insights on what each technology is, how long it takes to learn, and what to learn next. Whether it’s Frontend (React, Vue.js), Backend (Node.js, Python), or others, we guide you through the key steps to make informed learning choices.

roadmapsSection.title: Clear Learning Paths to Become a Developer
roadmapsSection.description: Our Roadmaps section helps you understand the skills needed to become a Frontend, Backend, or Full Stack Developer. We provide structured guides that outline the essential steps and learning order to follow. Whether you’re focused on frontend technologies, backend development, or full-stack, we’ve got a roadmap for you.

freeContent.title: Understand the Technologies Behind Development
freeContent.description: Want to know more about the technologies you need to learn? In our Technologies section, you’ll find detailed information about each key technology, including what it is and why it's important, how long it takes to learn and what to learn next. We provide insights into technologies such as Frontend (React, Vue.js), Backend (Node.js, Python), and others to help you make informed decisions about your learning journey. Each page gives you a snapshot of the learning path, so you know exactly where to start and where to go next.

roadmaps.title: Roadmaps
roadmaps.description: Devs Learning offers structured learning paths to help you master web development. Whether you’re focused on front-end, back-end, or full-stack, these guides provide a clear roadmap of the essential skills and technologies to learn.
roadmaps.journeyDescription: Are you interested in becoming a web developer but don’t know where to begin? Whether you dream of building stunning websites, handling back-end systems, or mastering everything in between, our roadmap guides are designed to help you take the first step. Follow a clear path and build the skills you need to start your journey into the world of web development.
roadmaps.rolesTitle: Understanding the Roles of Web Developers
roadmaps.frontendDescription: A frontend developer focuses on the design and layout of websites. They work with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create the user interface and experience. They ensure that a website looks good and functions smoothly on all devices and browsers.
roadmaps.backendDescription: Backend developers work on the server-side of web applications. They create databases, handle server communication, and manage user authentication. They use languages like Node.js, Python, and Ruby to make sure everything behind the scenes works seamlessly.
roadmaps.fullstackDescription: Full stack developers are skilled in both frontend and backend development. They are capable of building both the client-side interface and the server-side logic. Full stack developers have a broad skill set and can manage both the front and back end of a web application from start to finish.
roadmaps.chooseYourPath: Choose Your Path and Start Learning

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: Explore the most in-demand technologies on Devs Learning. Each technology includes detailed information about its purpose, applications, and learning resources to help you master it.
technologies.author: Author
technologies.noResults: No courses found for your search. Please try other filters.

courses.title: Courses
courses.description: Explore the best programming courses on Devs Learning. We have carefully curated the most popular courses, both free and paid, in English and Spanish, so you can learn the most in-demand technologies, improve your skills, and advance in your career as a developer.

about.title: About
about.mission_description: Our mission is to provide a reliable and accessible directory of free programming resources, offering courses, roadmaps, and guides to help developers of all levels learn, grow, and continuously update their technical skills. We aim to be a reference site, providing users with not only access to the best courses but also key information about technologies, estimated learning times, and clear pathways for further progress in their careers.
about.vision_description: Our vision is to become the leading platform for learning programming, supporting developers of all levels on their path to professional success. We want to be the go-to site for discovering structured roadmaps, gaining insights into technologies, and finding quality courses that help users stay updated with the latest technologies and market trends. We aim to democratize access to programming education for free, providing accessible, high-quality resources for everyone.

florencia.professionalProfile: Graphic Designer, Illustrator and UX-UI Designer
